steps.title: 3 steps to USDT in your account
steps.subtitle: We have made the connection and setup as comfortable and fast as possible, and our support team is ready to help with any questions.

step1.title: Add the bot and set the ad frequency
step1.text: Connect the bot or channel via API, specify the admin, and choose the allowed ad display frequency in the ad channel.

step2.title: The ad is published for 48 hours
step2.text: The post remains active for 48 hours after moderation. After this period, the post is deleted.

step3.title: Every 24 hours, payment arrives in USDT
step3.text: We send funds for views (CPM) to your AdsGram account wallet every 24 hours.

trust.title: Why can you trust us?
